CustomField.formula: "By entering my name as a digital signature below, I understand that my authorization will remain in effect until further notice and that the information will be handled confidentially and in compliance with applicable laws." &BR() &BR()& "I understand that I may revoke the authorization at any time by written and dated communication. I have read and understand the nature of this release. I declare under penalty of perjury by the laws of the State of California that the foregoing is true and correct." &BR() &BR()& "I certify that all of the content in this release is true and that this e-signature is both legal and binding."
CustomField.label: Agent Authorization Confirmation
